name: War After
summary: Constant conflict between the nations and diminishing resources brought an end to the world as we knew it. Resources became scarce and several factions will stop at nothing to get what remains. Answer a call of duty and join one of the factions’ special forces in a post-apocalyptic world of eternal crossfire confrontation. Fight on several fallout arenas, choose and upgrade weapons, fighters and gears to dominate the world and lead your division to victory. Rise your rank through battles to access better shooting equipment!
